title: BBC Local Live: Merseyside and west Cheshire on Thursday 8 September 2016 - BBC News
summary: gmp officer suspended over use of hillsborough .
two men are shot in the legs in speke .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates from merseyside and west cheshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on friday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the region .

documents.title: weather : cloudy with some showers
text: some late sunny intervals at first but then cloud amounts will increase , bringing a few showers later .
dry on friday morning with some sunny intervals .
however , the skies will cloud over from the west during the afternoon with heavy rain and strong winds arriving later .

documents.title: man shot on residential street in banks
text: a 42-year-old man has been shot in mere brow near southport .
author: Southport Visiter

documents.title: liverpool father and son donkey ride operators charged with animal cruelty
text: a father and son who run a well-known liverpool donkey ride business have been charged with a raft of animal cruelty offences .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: dog dumped outside dogs trust in huyton
text: a dog was dumped outside a merseyside rescue centre and it was so poorly it had to be put down , the rspca has revealed .
the female staffordshire bull terrier was so weak she could n't stand up when she was left outside the dogs trust centre in whiston lane in huyton on monday .
they want to find the person who left her there .

documents.title: m56 closures in cheshire as work continues on £ 192m dual carriageway
text: drivers in cheshire are being advised of a series of overnight carriageway closures as work to complete new slip roads for the new £ 192m a556 knutsford to bowdon dual carriageway between the m6 and m56 continues .
author: Chester Chronicle

documents.title: 'serious incident ' in neston is assault
text: police are attending a .
`` serious assault '' in the tannery lane area .
the serious assault in # neston is believed to have occurred in the tannery lane area .
a number of police cordons are currently in place

documents.title: breakinggmp officer suspended over alleged hillsborough image use
text: a police officer has been suspended for gross misconduct over the alleged use of images from the hillsborough disaster in an internal training session , greater manchester police said .

in a separate incident in june , gmp apologised for using a `` distressing '' photo of liverpool fans at hillsborough on a poster advertising `` super recognisers '' who are skilled at out a face in a crowd .
asst ch con debbie ford said : the fact that we believe these images have been used again is totally unacceptable . ''
she has written to the victims ' families apologising for the distress caused and has suspended the super recogniser programme until 2017 .

documents.title: 'serious incident ' investigated in neston
text: cheshire police said they are dealing with a serious incident in neston .
officers are currently dealing with a serious incident in stanneyfields park , # neston .
the park is closed at the current time .

documents.title: residents fear restoration work is damaging character of wirral village hall
text: householders in willaston are concerned restoration work on the village hall is damaging its character .
author: Wirral Globe

documents.title: almost one in seven beds being blocked at liverpool hospitals
text: almost one in seven beds at two of liverpool 's largest hospitals are currently being `` blocked '' by patients well enough to be discharged , the liverpool echo reports .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: former eveton striker bert llewellyn dies aged 77
text: former everton footballer bert llewellyn has died at the age of 77 .
he played 11 games for the blues in the 1950s , and went on to play for several other clubs including crewe and wigan .
in a statement , everton said the thoughts of everyone at the club are with his family and friends .
read the full tribute on the club 's website .

documents.title: four-year-old boy injured in speke shooting
text: a four-year-old boy was injured during a double shooting in liverpool .
the boy suffered superficial injuries along with a 22-year-old woman after shots were fired at a property in millwood road in speke last night .
a 25-year-old man was taken to hospital with wounds to his stomach .
at an earlier incident a 27-year-old man suffered minor injuries after shots were fired at a property in prenton green at about 20:00 .

documents.title: travel : obstruction on merseyrail line in bebington
text: there are delays on merseyrail in wirral due to an obstruction on the line .
latest from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : bright afternoon
text: some cloud but a bright afternoon and it will feel warm with highs of 20c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: new routes from liverpool john lennon airport next summer
text: ryanair is adding new routes at liverpool john lennon airport for next summer despite a warning it would be cutting back flights in the uk following the brexit vote .
the new routes are to bari in italy , barcleona girona in span and prague in the czech republic as well as the introduction of summer routes to marrakech in morroco and sofia in bulgaria .
ryanair 's robin kiely said there 'll be growth in liveprool this year and regional airports are `` still growing strongly '' .

documents.title: sick dog dumped outside mersyeside rescue centre
text: a dog that was so weak that it was unable to stand up has been dumped outside a rescue centre in merseyside .
the female staffordshire bull terrier was discovered collapsed at the dog 's trust centre in whiston lane in huyton on monday morning .
the pet had to be put to down as it was too unwell to treat .
the rspca is trying to find the person who dumped the dog .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: liverpool university to hide applicants ' names in anti-bias trial
text: the university of liverpool is taking part in a scheme to hide applicants ' names for the first time to stop potential discrimination based on assumptions about students .
the pilot scheme at liverpool , exeter , huddersfield and winchester has been set up by the admissions service , ucas .
the names of applicants to four universities will be hidden from staff in an attempt to avoid bias .
it says there is no evidence of systematic bias in the system - but it wants to test whether a name-blind approach makes the process fairer .

documents.title: man denies hurling pet dog against a wall
text: a 20-year-old man has pleaded not guilty to throwing a pet dog against a wall in southport .
author: Southport Visiter

documents.title: merseyside police celebrate 130 years of mounted section
text: merseyside police is marking 130 years since the founding of its mounted section .
in 1886 , liverpool police became the first provincial police force in britain to have a permanent group of officers who patrol on horseback .
meet @ twitterid largest officer !
events are happening today to mark the mounted section 's 130th anniversary
he 's lovely .
think he should get a little black bobby hat though !

documents.title: liverpool councillor calls for sun newspaper ban
text: a councillor has tabled a cross party motion for liverpool city council to approve a ban on all newspaper vendors selling the sun over its hillsborough disaster coverage .
garston and speke councillor mary rasmussen is calling on the authority to ask vendors across the city to take the paper off its shelves .
she put forward the idea after hearing about the total eclipse of the sn campaign group - and insists it is n't a form of censorship .
after the 1989 disaster , the paper claimed on its front page that liverpool fans had `` the pockets of victims '' and `` urinated '' on police officers .
in 2012 , the former sun editor kelvin mckenzie apologised to the people of liverpool for the truth headline , saying he had been `` misled '' .
in a statement , he said : `` it would have been far more accurate had i written the headline the lies rather than the truth . ''

text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: dangerous prisoner hunted by police
text: a dangerous prisoner is being hunted by police after he was arrested and then released on bail .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: murder charge following death of frenchman in ellesmere port
text: a man has been charged with murder in connection to remains found at a house in ellesmere port in 2013 .
the remains of christophe borgye , 36 , from france , were found at a house in in hylton court four years after he was reported missing .
manuel wagner , a 28-year-old german national who now resides in toxteth , liverpool , will appear before chester magistrates ' court later .

documents.title: 'hillsborough law ' drafted by victims ' families ' legal team
text: lawyers for the relatives of 96 people who died at hillsborough have drafted a new law to compel public officials to tell the truth at inquiries .
jurors at the new inquests found the fans who died as a result of the 1989 crush were unlawfully killed .
the victims ' families campaigned for 27 years for the truth despite senior officers ' lies and an alleged cover-up .
the hillsborough law , which includes penalties and fines , would address a `` culture of denial '' , campaigners said .

documents.title: two men shot in legs in liverpool
text: two men are in hospital after being shot in the legs in speke .
there were reports of a gun being fired in prenton green last night before shots were heard in the millwood road area .
the scene has been cordoned off and at this stage detectives are unsure of a motive .

documents.title: travel : police incident in speke
text: millwood road in speke in liverpool , is closed westbound between the eastern avenue junction and the ganworth road junction because of a police incident .

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: hello from liverpool , i 'm here with all your news , sport , travel and weather updates from across merseyside and west cheshire today .
if you 've got a story you 'd like me to hear about or a photograph you 'd like to share , you can contact me on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Jenny Coleman
Reporter, BBC Local Live
